job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: pWe are seeking a Senior Software Engineer to help us build our data automation platform targeted at business users from the ground up using public cloud infrastructure and services Your position requires handson development while collaborating with the team in driving the critical technical decisions and infrastructure needed to launch support and ramp the product in a fastpaced environment You enjoy working closely with product and design to align on requirements and priorities to produce a bestinclass product experience You have a thinkerdoer mentality and can think broadly but deep dive into details and help shape the team cultureppbrppuRecommended SkillsuppbrpulliBachelor of Science degree or equivalent experience with strong coding skillsliliDeveloped and shipped products using Javascript with frontend React and backend Nodejs frameworksliliHandson experience with using REST APIs SQL  NoSQL databases authentication services web frameworks and integrating with 3rd party applicationsliliWorking Knowledge of cloud platforms eg Azure GCP or AWSliliAble to confidently make technology decisions and back them upliliUnderstanding of scripting languages eg JavaScript Python Go PHP etcliliPassion for delivering highquality software by writing clean code and using testdriven development methodologies you seek out the root cause when debugging software defects and champion improvements that prevent future issuesliliWorks across teams have great attention to detail and exhibit excellent written and verbal communication skillsliulpbrppuBenefitsuppuspan classqlcursorspanupulliMacBook AirProliliVision dental and medical plan choicesliliFlexible working hoursliliCompetitive salary amp 401KliliFlexiblePersonal Time OffliliEmployee Stock Purchase Plans and other financial benefitsliliPaid Holidaysliulpbrp
